column5: ok my DVR for my underwater camera quit working, so I needed something to replace it I came up with this it is a personal recorder it uses rca jacks to hook up to my underwater camera..I can also see on the LCD monitor on it, so I don't need to be humped over the TV for the aquavu plus a second person can watch the LCD while I am watching the TV here is a short clip I recorded off the TV/expressvu oh and it's a video camara too and a still camera a mp3 player a computer camera and has about 25 games on it to play I got it off ebay you can get them for..from 85 bucks to about 170 I think it does a good job for what I want it for love toys
Crips... how many times did you have to throw the other one to get it to break.. so the boss would let you buy a new toy just in time for a trip North ?  HAHAHAHA
if it can make you breakfast I'd say marry it
but does it clean and cook the fish??     Very nice toy!   Amazing all the features they can pack into one gadget these days!!
oh and it slices it dices it makes perfect french fries
That's cool Terry.  Can't wait to see it work.  That pic I took of the carp didn't work out from your screen     All i can see is our reflections.  Joey
ok that thing is very cool!  cheers!
Hey Terry - how is the zoom on that thing? - Can you make small fish look bigger!    Don
